price: বৰকতময় তোমাৰ প্ৰতিপালকৰ নাম, যিজন মহামহিম আৰু মহানুভৱ।
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
